page.title: 05POP MUSIC IN THE EIGHTIES
page.content: POP MUSIC HAS CHANGED A LOT SINCE THE SWINGING SIXTIES. NOW WE HAVE{DURAN {DURAN,WHAM AND NIK KERSHAW.}WE CAN LISTEN TO SONGS ON THE{RADIO, CASSETTE {PLAYERS AND HIFI SYSTEMS.}YOU CAN ALSO LISTEN TO MUSIC ON A{COMPACT DISC.} SOME PEOPLE LIKE MUSIC CALLED {HEAVY {METAL.}THE FAMOUS{HEAVY METAL}GROUPS ARE{MEATLOAF,STATUS QUO AND IRON {MAIDEN.}THERE ARE DIFFERENT KINDS OF RECORDS. THERE IS THE{L.P,THE SINGLE,7 {INCH AND 12 INCH.}THERE ARE ALSO DIFFERENT SPEEDS FOR THE RECORDS. THERE IS{33 RPM FOR L.P'S AND 45 RPM {FOR SINGLES.}THE NUMBER ONE IN THE POP CHARTS AT THE MOMENT IS{"19" BY PAUL {HARDCASTLE.}LISTENING TO POP MUSIC IS A LEISURE ACTIVITY MANY PEOPLE ENJOY.
